title: Fountain of Pleasure
description: The Battle of Samhain, the feast of the dead, the darkest hour for the world of fairy and mortal alike when the ravagng Felorian host gains its greatest strength. Rival Sidhe warriors Cheveyo and Dristan have agreed to fight side by side to protect their mortal lover. But Donna's presence in the land of the Sidhe has awakened a powerful enemy.
author: Beth Kery
